_header: Better it is a lie be mold by Reason
_description: Proverbial couplet comparing a lie based on reason and truth spoken out of season — one couplet

GULHun230.Transcription:
Bettyr it ys a lye be mold by ResounThanne throgth be Spoken owtt off
                    Seyssoun
GULHun230.Note: Added to end flyleaf by hand of s. xvi.
